Summary: Early hunting season allows late evening sky observations. Small sky beacons, call clouds to minnesota
divs: Sighting DetailsI'm raising two children by myself. Teaching them to hunt is critical native american life style and fullfils dietary consistency. From some point in sept. we began noticing beacon style, non-moving(for at least an hour)lights that dont rotate with the rest of the sky. We use these markers much, but as of late the sky has been temporarily bench marked in the north, east, and south. Even, switching off as their departure. Being an army veteran of service during two wars, I have been many places, and am not really gullible. Trained, I now snap into an almost robot like state(photographic)under pressure. I funtion supremely under the threat of death, harm to America or any of her children, or detriment to our great Consitution, foreign or domestic. I would like more time for this report, but dinner overrides your enlightenment. Please call or visit. I'm sure my entire mil.svc will interest you greatly as well. Your friend Joe.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Garrison
There were no other sightings in Garrison on or around September 20th 2007
